name: Dear Rick Astley Please Forgive Me

metadata.name: Dear Rick 01
metadata.description:
“BRAVO 12- 1988 (3) Tiffany Dominoe Rick Astley David Hallyday Climie/Fisher Bros Condition: Good” 
A graphic exploration of secondary market value of Rick Astley collectibles from the 80s. Each drawing is a reproduction of Rick Astley memorabilia being sold online and hand drawn exactly as the original listing appeared, the item descriptions also reflect that of the original listing’s. Properties include how the product was styled and photographed by the seller, as well as how Rick appears in the image.  
This NFT works together with the artist book DEAR RICK ASTLEY PLEASE FORGIVE ME as a conceptual art project about long term collectible value and authenticity. The NFTs are numbered in the order the images appear in the book.
